introduction: 《反对核武器Amanationen》Anton Kaun/王子衡/慕尼黑Rote Sonne/2020噪音艺术现场纪录片2020年3月初，来自中国北京的书法艺术家钱赓和实验音乐艺术家王子衡，在欧洲疫情爆发伊始前往德国进行“铁打金刚（The Iron Arhan）”行为艺术巡演。本片由钱赓拍摄制作，影片记录了巡演中王子衡和德国传奇噪音艺术家安东·考恩（Anton Kaun）的一场名为“Amanationen”的即兴现场。演出由旅居慕尼黑多年的日本艺术家草场俊雄（Toshio Kusaba）举办，地点是慕尼黑Rote Sonne，有来自世界各地的7组声音艺术家共同表演，主题为“反对核武器”。"Amanationen Against Nuclear Weapons"Anton Kaun/Wang Ziheng/Munich Rote Sonne/2020 Noise Art Live DocumentaryIn early March 2020, calligraphy artist Qian Geng and experimental music artist Wang Ziheng from Beijing, China, went to Germany for a performance art tour of "The Iron Arhan" at the beginning of the outbreak in Europe.This film was shot and produced by Qian Geng. The film records an impromptu scene called "Amanationen" by Wang Ziheng and the legendary German noise artist Anton Kaun during the tour. The performance was organized by Toshio Kusaba, a Japanese artist who has lived in Munich for many years. The venue is Rote Sonne, Munich. There are 7 groups of sound artists from all over the world performing together with the theme "Against Nuclear Weapons".
